solution_line_template: The price of the book is down by: {last_week_price}*{percent_down} = $<<{last_week_price}*{percent_down}={price_decrease}>>{price_decrease}.
So the new price of the movie ticket is: {last_week_price} - {price_decrease} = $<<{last_week_price}-{price_decrease}={new_price}>>{new_price}.
